text: Aanei nia mee a Dimaadua di Gowaa Aamua, go di God o Israel, ne helekai i di hai o Moab,48.1 Isaiah 15.1—16.14; 25.10-12; Ezekiel 25.8-11; Amos 2.1-3; Zephaniah 2.8-11 “Hagaaloho dangada digau Nebo, di nadau waahale gu mooho! Kiriathaim guu kumi, dono waahale mau dangihi la gu meheu gi lala, ono daangada gu langaadia.
